context: Tests whether the agent demonstrates systematic approaches to removing duplication in BDD tests, refactoring similar scenarios, creating reusable step definitions, and maintaining test suite quality during maintenance.

checklist.name: Duplication identification
checklist.description: Identifies specific patterns of duplication in scenarios and step definitions

checklist.name: Scenario consolidation strategy
checklist.description: Demonstrates how to consolidate similar scenarios while preserving test coverage and intent

checklist.name: Step definition refactoring
checklist.description: Shows how to refactor similar steps into reusable, parameterized definitions

checklist.name: Maintains scenario readability
checklist.description: Ensures refactored scenarios remain readable and understandable to non-technical stakeholders

checklist.name: Systematic refactoring approach
checklist.description: Provides a methodical process for identifying and eliminating duplication across the test suite

checklist.name: Preserves test intent
checklist.description: Maintains the original business intent and coverage while reducing duplication

checklist.name: Reusable step library design
checklist.description: Creates patterns for building reusable, maintainable step definition libraries
